trans-unit.source: 1) Create a blank robots.txt file in your root directory.
trans-unit.target: 1) Creeaza un fisier robots.txt gol in directorul radacina.

trans-unit.source: 2) Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).
trans-unit.target: 2) Ii dai permisiuni de scriere (CHMOD 666 pe un sistem Unix).

trans-unit.source: Aliases and results are both required.
trans-unit.target: Aliasurile si rezultatele sunt toate obligatorii.

trans-unit.source: All keywords must be separated
trans-unit.target: Toate cuvintele cheie trebuie separate

trans-unit.source: All mandatory keywords (*) must be included in the route
trans-unit.target: Toate cuvintele cheie obligatorii (*) trebuie incluse in ruta

trans-unit.source: An address located in a country containing states must have a state selected.
trans-unit.target: O adresa situata intr-o tara care contine judete trebuie sa aibe un judet selectat.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while updating this group.
trans-unit.target: A aparut o eroare la actualizarea grupului.

trans-unit.source: An order status with the same name already exists: %s
trans-unit.target: Exista deja un stadiu cu acelasi nume al comenzii: %s

trans-unit.source: As long as a keyword has an associated value, you can use the syntax {prepend:keyword:append} to add text before and after it.
trans-unit.target: Atata timp cat un cuvant cheie are o valoare asociata, poti utiliza sintaxa {prepend:keyword:append} pentru a adauga text inainte si dupa el.

trans-unit.source: Assign a valid page if you want it to be read.
trans-unit.target: Atribuie o pagina valida daca vrei sa poata fi citita.

trans-unit.source: Before being able to use this tool, you need to:
trans-unit.target: Inainte de a putea folosi aceasta unealta, trebuie sa:

trans-unit.source: Before making any changes to the default pattern of your URLs, make sure to meet the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: Inainte de a modifica modelul prestabilit al adreselor URL, asigura-te ca indeplinesti urmatoarele cerinte:

trans-unit.source: Before you can use this tool, you need to:
trans-unit.target: Inainte sa poti folosi acest instrument, trebuie sa:

trans-unit.source: Caution: The discount applied to a category does not stack with the overall reduction but instead replaces it.
trans-unit.target: Atentie: reducerea aplicata unei categorii nu se adauga la reducerea globala ci o inlocuieste.

trans-unit.source: Click here to set a URL for this shop.
trans-unit.target: Da clic aici pentru a seta un URL pentru acest magazin

trans-unit.source: Create a blank .htaccess in your root directory.
trans-unit.target: Creeaza un fisier .htacces gol in folderul radacina.

trans-unit.source: Generate your "robots.txt" file by clicking on the following button (this will erase the old robots.txt file)
trans-unit.target: Genereaza fisier "robots.txt" apasand pe urmatorul buton (aceasta va sterge vechiul fisier robots.txt)

trans-unit.source: Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).
trans-unit.target: Da permisia de scriere (CHMOD 666 pe un sistem Unix).

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the URL for your shop. If you migrate your shop to a new URL, remember to change the values below.
trans-unit.target: Aici poti seta URL-ul pentru magazin. Daca migrezi magazinul la un alt URL, nu uita sa schimbi valorile mai jos.

trans-unit.source: Is not a valid alias
trans-unit.target: Nu este un alias valid

trans-unit.source: Is not a valid result
trans-unit.target: nu este un rezultat valid.

trans-unit.source: Keywords must be in braces {keyword}
trans-unit.target: Cuvintele cheie trebuie sa fie intre acolade {keyword}

trans-unit.source: Latitude and longitude are required.
trans-unit.target: Latitudine si longitudine sunt necesare.

trans-unit.source: Only products that have this category as the default category will be affected.
trans-unit.target: Vor fi afectate doar produsele care au aceasta categorie ca si categorie implicita.

trans-unit.source: Please create some sub-categories for this root category.
trans-unit.target: Te rugam creeaza cateva sub-categorii pentru acesta categorie-radacina.

trans-unit.source: The Base URI is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Adresa URI de baza nu este valida.

trans-unit.source: The Friendly URL feature must be enabled
trans-unit.target: Functionalitatea de adresa URL prietenoasa trebuie sÄƒ fie activata

trans-unit.source: The discount value is incorrect (must be a percentage).
trans-unit.target: Valoarea reducerii este incorecta (trebuie sa fie un procentaj).

trans-unit.source: The discount value is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Valoarea reducerii este incorecta.

trans-unit.source: The multistore option is enabled. If you want to change the URL of your shop, you must go to the "Multistore" page under the "Advanced Parameters" menu.
trans-unit.target: Optiunea de magazine multiple este activata, daca doresti sa schimbi URL-ul sitului trebuie sa mergi in pagina "Magazine multiple" din meniul "Parametri avansati".

trans-unit.source: The specified state is not located in this country.
trans-unit.target: Judetul/statul/comitatul specificat nu este localizat in aceasta tara.

trans-unit.source: There are several available keywords for each route listed below; note that keywords with * are required!
trans-unit.target: Exista cateva cuvinte-cheie disponibile pentru fiecare ruta din lista de mai jos; atentie, cele cu * sunt obligatorii!

trans-unit.source: This is not a valid IP address:
trans-unit.target: Se pare ca aceasta nu este o adresa IP:

trans-unit.source: This section enables you to change the default pattern of your links. In order to use this functionality, PrestaShop's "Friendly URL" option must be enabled, and Apache's URL rewriting module (mod_rewrite) must be activated on your web server.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta sectiune va faciliteaza modificarea sabloanelor implicite ale linkurilor tai. Pentru a folosi aceasta functionalitate, optiunea "Adrese URL prietenoase" din PrestaShop > SEO si adrese URL trebuie sa fie activata si modulul de rescriere a adreselor URL din Apache (mod_rewrite) trebuie sa fie activat pe serverul tau de web.

trans-unit.source: To add a keyword in your URL, use the {keyword} syntax. If the keyword is not empty, you can add text before or after the keyword with syntax {prepend:keyword:append}. For example {-hey-:meta_title} will add "-hey-my-title" in the URL if the meta title is set.
trans-unit.target: Pentru a adauga un cuvant-cheie in adresa URL, folosesti sintaxa {keyword}. Daca respectivul cuvant-cheie nu este gol, ii poti adauga text inainte sau dupa cu sintaxa {prepend:keyword:append}. De examplu {-hey-:meta_title} va adauga "-hey-my-title" in adresa URL daca meta-titlul este configurat.

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting must be activated on your web server
trans-unit.target: Functionalitatea de rescriere a adresei URL trebuie sa fie activata in serverul web

trans-unit.source: Warning: You won't be able to change the group of this shop if this shop belongs to a group with one of these options activated: Share Customers, Share Quantities or Share Orders.
trans-unit.target: Atentie: nu vei putea schimba grupul acestui magazin daca el apartine unui grup care are una aceste optiuni activate: Clienti comuni, Stocuri comune sau Comenzi comune.

trans-unit.source: Wrong category ID.
trans-unit.target: ID categorie gresit.

trans-unit.source: You can only display the page list in a shop context.
trans-unit.target: Se poate afisa lista de pagini doar in contextul unui magazin.

trans-unit.source: You can only move your shop to a shop group with all "share" options disabled -- or to a shop group with no customers/orders.
trans-unit.target: Poti muta magazinul doar intr-un grup cu toate optiunile de partajare dezactivate sau intr-un grup fara clienti/comenzi.

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency)
trans-unit.target: Nu poti sterge acest magazin (exista dependente de client si/sau comenzi)

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency).
trans-unit.target: Nu poti sterge acest magazin (exista dependente de client si/sau comenzi).

trans-unit.source: You cannot save group reductions.
trans-unit.target: Nu se pot salva reducerile de grup.

trans-unit.source: You must define an SMTP server and an SMTP port. If you do not know it, use the PHP mail() function instead.
trans-unit.target: Trebuie definit un server SMTP si un port SMTP. Daca nu stii cum, folosesti functia mail() a PHP.

trans-unit.source: You need to select at least the root category.
trans-unit.target: Trebuie sa selectezi cel putin o categorie radacina.

trans-unit.source: You should also comply with the syntax:
trans-unit.target: De asemenea, trebuie respectata sintaxa:

trans-unit.source: Your robots.txt file MUST be in your website's root directory and nowhere else (e.g. http://www.example.com/robots.txt).
trans-unit.target: Fisierul robots.txt TREBUIE sa fie in directorul radacina al site-ului si nicaieri altundeva (de ex. http://www.site.ro/robots.txt).
